title: Why OnPaintSurface method is called so may times ?
body:
on `SKCanvas` I am drawing multiple bitmaps and let user scale, drag and rotate that images.
Everything works fine but `OnPaintSurface` is called 2 times for 1 bitmap. Because of this, my performance gets slow after some time.
These things are decided by OS from device or are managed in plugin itself ?

Please help !
